description:
Comfortable and grippy trail shoes for mountain adventures where speed counts. The incredibly light upper has a printed overlay to increase durability in high-wear areas, and the heel cup holds your foot securely on uneven terrain. The outsole is made with a super sticky compound and has grooved lugs for sure-footedness on slippery surfaces.

  • Breathable mesh upper uses a seamless construction
  • Stretch gaiter over the tongue keeps out trail debris
  • Salewa 3F System connects the instep with the sole and heel for a supportive, flexible fit
  • Removable OrthoLite footbed adds comfort
  • Dual-density EVA midsole cushions and supports feet over tricky ground
  • Motion Guidance midsole and outsole encourage natural foot movement
  • Pomoca® outsole grips wet or dry surfaces
name: Salewa Ultra Train 3 Light Trail Shoes - Men's
